annotations.title: Making a Blood and Sand

textContent:
.75oz Orange juice
.75oz Cherry Flavored Liqueur (Cherry Heering)
.75oz Sweet Vermouth
.75oz Scotch

Shake and pour
Garnish with orange peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SOdK9CpCU6g
title: Blood and Sand
